name: Flucers
description:
Flucers - mobile auto battler with elements of alchemy.  This page is just a web demo with only one (and core) mechanic - crossbreeding. 

Crossbreed monsters to:

  1. Collect themed collections like Japanese one
  2. Sell them
  3. Gain monsters with better characteristics

Create a squad from your monsters. It will protect your village from enemies:

  1. Collected collections passively strengthen it
  2. You can put a weapon on a monster, it determines its class
  3. Classes define augmentation that strengthens the squad, just like in team fight tactics

Develop your village to expand the number of breeding sites, squad capacity, etc.

Pick apples, plant new trees, buy monsters in the market

Release sometime, subscribe and stay tuned!
